{{video game infobox

| name = ''The Lord of the Rings Online: Before the Shadow''

'''''The Lord of the Rings Online: Before the Shadow''''' is the tenth expansion for ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]''.

In this expansion there were added two started regions: [[Swanfleet]] and [[Cardolan]]. All races now have the option, if they own this expansion, to start in Swanfleet, instead of [[Ered Luin]] for Elves and Dwarves, [[Shire]] for Hobbits and [[Bree-land]] for Men. With this expansion also comes a new first part of the new Epic Story Line, "The Song of Waves and Wind", guided by [[Boromir]].

==Updates==
===Update 35: Return to Carn D没m===
''Return to Carn D没m'' was released on [[22 March]], [[2023]].

* Multiple instances have been added in [[Carn D没m]]: 2 small fellowships and one full fellowship instance. A Raid is also planned. 
* There was a big power and damage revamp.
* The [[Last Homely House]] had a complete makeover.

===Update 36: Gondor Renewed===
''Gondor Renewed'' was released on [[31 May]], [[2023]].

* A new region, called the ''King's Gondor'', was added. This is [[Gondor]] after the crowning of [[Aragorn II]]. 
* A new storyline, called ''The Song of Waves and Wind'', was added. In this story you have to help Gondor to recover after the War of the Ring.
* A new landscape difficulty, called ''The Paths of the Valour'' is available.

===Update 37: The Humble Homes of The Holbytlan===
''The Humble Homes of The Holbytlan'' was released on [[29 August]], [[2023]].

* Addition of a starting character new race, the River Hobbit
* New premier housing district: Lyndelby Homestead
* To reduce bloat, attribute and stat "squish" made across the entire game, reducing most numbers by a factor of 10.
